name: Tanks Assault - arcade tank battle game
name_original: Tanks Assault - arcade tank battle game
description:
Fight through tank battles in the desert sand and see how long you survive!

Fast paced and challenging battles as you face down overwhelming numbers of enemy tanks. Enemy tanks can shoot with regular guns, cannons, heat seeking shells, and the dreaded deadly three-gun tank. Includes 60 challenging levels of desert tank battles with 3 different worlds.

FEATURES:
- 60 challenging levels of desert tank combat
- Beautiful 3D arcade style graphics
- Terrain and walls for cover and strategy
- Tracers follow each shell fired
- Five types of enemy tanks to fight against
- 3 lives to make it through each level
- Fast paced fun

TO PLAY:
- Use onscreen joystick to move tank
- Finger on screen to aim your gun/turn turret
- Tap to fire your gun
